ISSUE.TITLE: [Feature] Select all records from a table
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Need for this feature** Ability to select all records from a table. For example, to delete all records. **Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.** From now it is only possible to select records one by one. **Describe the solution you'd like** Checkbox on top of "#" column. **Describe alternatives you've considered** "Select all" button. Multi select of rows with shift button. **Additional context** No.
